title: Trusting God in a High-Risk Pregnancy
itunes:author: Featured Guests: Greg & Erin Smalley, Suzanne Gosselin
itunes:summary:
It's normal to be anxious if you're facing a high-risk pregnancy. John and Danny offer advice for coming alongside friends struggling with fear.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Suzanne Gosselin's book "Expectant Parents" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-01-14?refcd=1065402

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/trusting-god-in-a-high-risk-pregnancy/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
